html: little one shall become…a strong nation. The little one is the gathered house of Israel, which started very small but will grow until it becomes very powerful in the strength of the Lord. This promise to Israel is an extension of the Lord's promise to Abraham, the father of the house of Israel, wherein a little one (Abraham) became a strong nation (Gen. 12:2; 18:18; see D&C 133:57-58).
